project.description: New 8-story residential apartment complex in San Francisco Bay Area. Project ID: SF-RC-0325-HQ. 120 residential units (mix of studios, 1BR, 2BR), ground-floor retail (5,000 sq ft), underground parking (150 spaces). Target budget: $18M (hard cap $19.5M). Target timeline: 24 months (must complete before Q4 2027 for tax incentives). Must achieve LEED Gold certification. Priorities: Cost is primary driver, but quality and sustainability cannot be sacrificed. Timeline important due to tax incentives.

bids.scope: Complete 8-story structure with reinforced concrete frame, 120 residential units, ground-floor retail spaces, underground parking garage (150 spaces), all MEP systems, landscaping, exterior finishes, and full LEED Gold certification process. Includes all permits and certifications. Proven track record with LEED-certified residential projects in SF Bay Area.
Complete construction including all residential units, retail space, parking, MEP systems, and LEED Gold certification. Strong SF Bay Area presence with multiple LEED projects completed.
Residential building construction with units and parking. LEED certification process to be coordinated separately.
